Description: Round-topped limestone stela divided into four registers: 1 - Three rows of Hieroglyphic text. 2 - Five kneeling figures; Hieroglyphic text in the field. 3 + 4 - Eleven columns of Hieroglyphic text topped by a single row.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 3. (pl.8)
